content: a sweet gift to welcome a new baby the bundle of joy hat is made from naturally soft printed cotton using only low impact dyes just right for sensitive skin can be knit in solid or printed organic cotton worsted 1 hank will make 2 adorable hats experience * advanced beginner materials * printed organic cotton worsted 100% certified organic cotton 100g/150yds 1 hank * size 7 4 5mm dpns or size to obtain gauge color shown * sweet pea no 2204 * sea holly no 2205 * lady slipper no 2206
